chat_history.message:
Hello,

My iPhone 12 mini has the above problem:
The camera is no longer sharp, and there's a shutter-like sound when taking photos. The issue started occurring after a morning software update without the phone being turned off. After performing the software update as instructed this morning, I was able to take two sharp photos. However, the third photo and all subsequent ones became unsharp again. I request repair or replacement.

Thank you for your help,

Hello ecomobile,

The client is contacting us because you have received the package for a warranty return on 07/06/2024. We remind you that the processing time (to return a product or refund) is 3 working days in the case of technical issue. If you do not reply with a valid tracking link before 17/06/2024 we will refund the order.

Thank you in advance for your attention,

Paulo Back Market customer Care

Dear Backcare,

Unfortunately, our repair team is unable to fix the issue and we do not have any available stocks for replacement. Instead, we have refunded the customer.

Regards,
AS

Dear ecomobile

Thank you for letting us know. The customer was informed and the case and SAV closed accordingly. Thank you for understanding.

Best Regards,

Paulo from the Back Care Team
